trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were 4 other sightings in Fort Worth on or around March 23rd 2011
divs: sighting detailsi came home from class and walked out on to our apartments balcony where my roommate was. when i got out there i thought i saw a shooting star so i told my roommate who stood up to look at it too. however, it was not like any shooting star any of us have ever seen. it was traveling over i-30 faster than any jet that either of us have ever seen. it was egg shaped and bright green and then instantly turned into a bright red\orange color and then seemed to go a little lower and then disappeared. the weird part about it, is that it did not really seem to have much of a tail at all. it probably lasted about 4-5 seconds. we looked online and what we saw was described as a "green fireball" but the one we saw did not have a tail unlike some of the photos and videos that we had found.
